record.alternateTitle1: Joseph P. Kennedy Jr. Mental Retardation Research Center
record.description: The Mental Development Clinic utilizes a spectrum of skills available at the University of Chicago to study and serve the mentally retarded. Research projects are already underway and others are planned.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: From the April 1968 issue of the University of Chicago Magazine.
